snippet.title: [Dec. 2023 Random Games] Yoru no Kasou [All Triangles, Parts, Checklists & Endings(atm?)]
snippet.description:
Game link: https://yaigi.itch.io/yorunokasou

Yoru no Kasou is a pure exploration game, without any story/plot, made by Yaigi, where you just explore, and find random limbs/parts and burn it to the bonfire, made in gbstudio.

Overall, it's still a nice game I guess. Sadly there's no music, hence I added some. I guess there might be some interpretation that can be made, despite already don't have story, but I guess little atm.

I think there will be more updates to this game, but I'm unsure on that.

Anyway, I hope you enjoy!

Songs Used (I'm sorry for some weird song choices):
=Safety from Cave Story
=Luna Ascension from Tower of Heaven
=EOIII
 - Labyrinth VI - The Vengeful God in the Dark Ocean Abyss
 - Town - The City in the Deep Blue Sea
=Luminous Lake from Yume 2kki
